description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB SQL role assignments.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql role assignment create
commands.summary: Create a SQL role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment create --account-name
                                       --principal-id
                                       --resource-group
                                       --scope
                                       [--no-wait]
                                       [--role-assignment-id]
                                       [--role-definition-id]
                                       [--role-definition-name]
examples:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment create --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
  --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8 \
  --role-definition-name "My Read Only Role" \
  --scope "/dbs/mydb/colls/mycontainer" \
  --principal-id 6328f5f7-dbf7-4244-bba8-fbb9d8066506

az cosmosdb sql role assignment create --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
  --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8 \
  --role-definition-id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39 \
  --scope "/dbs/mydb/colls/mycontainer" \
  --principal-id 6328f5f7-dbf7-4244-bba8-fbb9d8066506

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql role assignment delete
commands.summary: Delete a SQL role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment delete --account-name
                                       --resource-group
                                       --role-assignment-id
                                       [--no-wait]
                                       [--yes]
examples: az cosmosdb sql role assignment delete --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql role assignment exists
commands.summary: Check if an Azure Cosmos DB role assignment exists.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment exists --account-name
                                       --resource-group
                                       --role-assignment-id
examples: az cosmosdb sql role assignment exists --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql role assignment list
commands.summary: List all SQL role assignments under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment list --account-name
                                     --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb sql role assignment list --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql role assignment show
commands.summary: Show the properties of a SQL role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment show --account-name
                                     --resource-group
                                     --role-assignment-id
examples: az cosmosdb sql role assignment show --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql role assignment update
commands.summary: Update a SQL role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment update --account-name
                                       --resource-group
                                       --role-assignment-id
                                       [--no-wait]
                                       [--principal-id]
                                       [--role-definition-id]
                                       [--role-definition-name]
                                       [--scope]
examples:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment update --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
  --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8 \
  --role-definition-id updated-role-definition-id

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql role assignment wait
commands.summary: Poll on a SQL role assignment until a specific condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql role assignment wait --account-name
                                     --resource-group
                                     --role-assignment-id
                                     [--created]
                                     [--custom]
                                     [--deleted]
                                     [--exists]
                                     [--interval]
                                     [--timeout]
                                     [--updated]
examples: az cosmosdb sql role assignment wait --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8 --deleted
